name: title
description: This property changes the last part of the welcome title. The new format is 'Welcome to ${title}!'.

name: linkTypeName
description: The default issue link type name used to link tickets in the same JIRA instance. Check the possible values for your instance using the rest URI (/rest/api/2/issueLinkType).

name: remoteRelationshipName
description: The 'relationship' name used to link remote tickets. That is tickets in different JIRA instances. More information [here](https://developer.atlassian.com/server/jira/platform/jira-rest-api-for-remote-issue-links/).
